Description: Null object ID column written upon export from ArcGIS
Name of coral restoration site
Source for coordinates of coral restoration site
Selected for restoration (yes/no)
Longitude of site in meters referenced to NAD_1983_StatePlane_Florida_East_FIPS_0901 (EPSG 26958)
Latitude of site in meters referenced to NAD_1983_StatePlane_Florida_East_FIPS_0901 (EPSG 26958)
ID of the node in which this site falls in the species' minimum planar graph
Area of the node in which this site falls in the species' minimum planar graph
Perimeter of the node in which this site falls in the species' minimum planar graph
Capacity (defined as the surface area weighted by mean habitat suitability) of the node in which this site falls in the species' minimum planar graph
Interaction Flux local connectivity value of the node in which this site falls in the species' minimum planar graph where #### represents the species' maximum dispersal distance in cost units
Percent cover of aggregate reef habitat in the node in which this site falls in the species' minimum planar graph
Percent cover of artificial habitat in the node in which this site falls in the species' minimum planar graph
Percent cover of patch reef habitat in the node in which this site falls in the species' minimum planar graph
Percent cover of mangrove habitat in the node in which this site falls in the species' minimum planar graph
Percent cover of pavement habitat in the node in which this site falls in the species' minimum planar graph
Percent cover of reef rubble habitat in the node in which this site falls in the species' minimum planar graph
Percent cover of ridge habitat in the node in which this site falls in the species' minimum planar graph
Percent cover of scattered coral and rock habitat in the node in which this site falls in the species' minimum planar graph
Percent cover of continuous seagrass habitat in the node in which this site falls in the species' minimum planar graph
Percent cover of discontinuous seagrass habitat in the node in which this site falls in the species' minimum planar graph
Percent cover of unconsolidated sediment in the node in which this site falls in the species' minimum planar graph
Mean Euclidean distance (meters) from the nearest continuous seagrass patch to the node in which this site falls in the species' minimum planar graph
Standard deviation of the mean Euclidean distance (meters) from the nearest continuous seagrass patch to the node in which this site falls in the species' minimum planar graph
Mean Euclidean distance (meters) from the nearest mangrove patch to the node in which this site falls in the species' minimum planar graph
Standard deviation of the mean Euclidean distance (meters) from the nearest mangrove patch to the node in which this site falls in the species' minimum planar graph
